Line.Text: How dare you?!
Your mistake took the lives of many people! And why, only because of your greed?!
The emperor is enraged at the official who made a grave mistake in attempts for a promotion and his pride.
The official, already kneeling, bends over even further, shivering in fear.
P- please forgive me, your majesty. Please have mercy.
Silence! Your mistake can only be accounted for with your head!
Actually.. [/n]Not even your head will satisfy me to relieve my anger!
Your majesty, I beg you.
Your majesty, I beg you.
The emperor slams his hand on the table with a loud bang and sweeps off a few cups and plates which break right away.
Hearing the slam and broken plates, the eunuchs guarding the door shiver in fear. Whenever the emperor is displeased, they are the ones who have to deal with the afterblow.
Suddenly the head eunuch in the room hides a small smile and walks up to the emperor to whisper in his ear. The emperor smiles as he looks at the official.
So… you want a chance to pay for your mistake? I heard you still have an unmarried beautiful daughter.
Y-yes, your majesty.
In surprise and relief the official relaxes his bow and raises slightly.
M-my eldest daughter is just about the right age to get married. If your majesty is interested, I can send her off to you.
If I’m interested? If I am interested?! I’m not interested in your brat!
The official looks confused at the emperor and carefully asks.
N-not interested? T-then what about her?
The emperor smiles.
General Stone is still looking for a wife. Marry your daughter to him and I’ll forgive you.
G-General Stone...? Liam Stone..? The brute who kills without a second thought? I can't do this to Rose..
In shock, the official bows all the way down to the ground again.
P-P-Please y-your m-m-majesty. Anyone but h-him.
THIS ISN'T A SUGGESTION, THIS IS AN ORDER!
Y-Your majesty...
You may choose, marry her off to the general, or grant me the heads of your whole clan.
B-but, your majesty.. I-I fear h-he might not like her.
If general Stone isn't interested, he may do with her as he pleases. She's at his disposal now, I don't care.
Now get the fuck out of here!
The official shivers in regret. His begging caused him to involve his family. Understanding he can not push the emperor any further, he gives up.
I- I.. I understand..

Lines.Line: [Mya] Rose...? Rose...?! Where are you hiding this time?
[Rose] Boo! Hahaha.
[Narrator] Rose jumps out of the storage box with a big smile on her face.
[Mya] Rose…
[Mya] You’re too old for this! Your mother would be really displeased if she knew.
[Rose] But it’s just you and you wouldn’t tell anyone.
[Narrator] Rose smiles as Mya looks around and sees the items on the ground which belong in the box Rose just jumped out of. Mya sighs and places the items back.
[Mya] Of course I won't tell anyone! I’m your personal maid and childhood friend. But if your parents find out, I’m the one in trouble for not stopping you.
[Narrator] Rose grabs Mya’s hands and smiles as a way of saying she won’t let anyone hurt her.
[Rose] Actually…. Tonight I dreamed of the time we met…
[Rose] Do you still remember?
[Narrator] Mya looks up in surprise and smiles gently.
[Mya] I do, I probably wouldn't have survived if not for that day…
[Mya] Your father wasn’t too pleased when you asked if I could stay.
[Rose] Until you offered to be my maid and promised to work hard. And you sure did work hard.
[Mya] Yeah.. aside from my chores you forced me to play with you too.
[Rose] Now don't say you didn't enjoy that.
[Narrator] Mya laughs at Rose's pouting face.
[Mya] I did enjoy that. As busy as I was, I always enjoyed fooling around with you and getting into trouble together.
[Narrator] Both Mya and Rose start to laugh as they remember the past.
[Mya] Rose, if you are done playing around, you should practice serving tea. You don't want to embarrass yourself in front of your husband when you're married.
[Rose] Don't worry about that, there's still a lot of time left before I get married. I don’t think my parents are looking for a husband yet.
[Mya] They probably feel embarrassed with your behaviour…
[Mya] Even if they aren't looking yet, you should still practice for when the time comes.

Text.AfterText: [Rose] Fine.. I’ll practice properly so you don't have to keep worrying about it.
[Rose] I will do it tomorrow.. The weather is so nice today, let's go to the garden.

Lines.Line: [Narrator] Mya agreed and the two went to the garden.
[Narrator] Rose and Mya walk around the beautiful flowers enjoying their sweet scents. Suddenly Rose saw a butterfly and got an idea.
[Rose] Lets catch some butterflies!

Text.AfterText: [Rose] Fine.. I’ll practice properly so you don't have to keep worrying about it.

Lines.Line: [Narrator]Another maid ran up to Rose and Mya with a worried look on her face.
[Maid]Miss! Your father is looking for you and he seemed quite unhappy! Did you do anything again?
[Narrator]Rose and Mya look at eachother.
[Rose]I didn't do anything today…. I think…?
[Mya]… Are you giving trouble now without even realizing it? Come let's go to your father before he gets more upset.
[Narrator]Rose and Mya follow the other maid to Rose's father.
[Narrator]When they arrive they see how both Rose’s parents are waiting. Rose’s father seems quite sad while her mother is in tears.
[Narrator]Rose quietly walks up to them.
[Rose]What's wrong..?
[Narrator]Upon seeing Rose, her mother starts to cry even louder. She gets up to walk to Rose and hugs her.
[Mother]Is there really no other way?
[Narrator]Rose’s father shakes his head slowly. Rose stares confused at the two.
[Rose]Mother? Father? What happened?
[Father]Rose…. I’m so sorry…
[Narrator]Rose her father hesitates for a bit before he continues. Unsure how to break the news to her.
[Father]The emperor has ordered for you to marry the general…
[Rose]Marrying a general? Isn't that good news?
[Narrator]Rose asks hesitantly.
[Father]You have to marry general Stone..
[Father]Rumours say hes…
[Narrator]Rose tries to recognize the name as she couldn't remember where she heard it before.
[Father]He’s quite a brute..
[Father]You will be in danger if you marry him…
[Mother]Why did it have to be our child.. Why Rose..
[Narrator]Rose couldn't believe what she's hearing.
[Rose]Why..?! Why do I have to marry a bute?! Why me?!
[Father]I made a mistake and this is the punishment the emperor chose. There's nothing I can do, I can't refuse an imperial edict.

Text.AfterText: [Rose] No! I wont accept this! This is your fault! Why do I have to pay for it?!

Lines.Line: [Narrator] Rose closes her eyes and takes a deep breath
[Rose] If there's no choice, I’ll marry him.
[Rose] Maybe things won't turn out as bad as they seem.
[Narrator] Rose returns to her room. She sits down on her bed quietly.
[Rose] Since that man is dangerous, I’ll have to be careful..
[Rose] Should I make him love me? Should I make him send me away?
[Rose] Destiny is in my hands now.
[Narrator] Rose gets mad and raises her voice.
[Rose] It’s unfair! UNFAIR!!
[Mother] Rose..
[Rose] No!
[Rose] I won’t marry!
[Narrator] Rose’s father who felt sad and guilty before suddenly gets angry at her behaviour
[Father] Rose! You have no choice! You will marry him!
[Father] If I could decline, I wouldn't marry you to such a man. But we can't decline! You hear me?!
[Father] It’s either that or all of our heads..
[Rose] I don't care! I hate you!
[Narrator] Rose screams and cries before running out.
[Narrator] Rose runs to her room and drops in tears on her bed.
[Rose] If I really have to marry that guy…
[Rose] I will take destiny in my own hands… Lets see if he still wants me..
